channel.title: Good Anime
channel.description:
Does anybody have some good animes to suggest? I like Death Note, Full Metal Panic, Hellsing, and Tokko. I don't like Bleach.
And if you are just going to post "OMFGS lolz anime faggot!!!11!1!!!" Then stfu and gtfo.> :frowning:

item.title: Good Anime
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
I was not at all a fan of Paranoia Agent. The series was far to abstract for me. Neither it’s supernatural elements nor it’s reality were clearly defined so you were often left confused as to what was actually happening and what was just stylized.

Read full topic

item.title: Good Anime
item.dc:creator: noonem
item.description:
Oh no, they’re not waiting for new material. There’s like 17 novels to 25 episodes in Spice and Wolf, so there’s a lot of shit to adapt. But seeing as the novels are finished, I’m having a hard time picturing a third season actually happening.
I read somewhere that the shows like this are almost developed as a commercial to the novels, I might’ve read that wrong because I’m fucking retarded, but if that’s the case then season 3 doesn’t seem that likely.

Read full topic

item.title: Good Anime
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
garrthbarrttinn:

Spice and Wolf was a very good series. I was too lazy to really follow much of the specific details of the plot; it involves a lot of complex trading shit, however I feel the series hardly suffered for my disinterest in the fine points. My main gripe would be that the story was not given nearly enough closure.perhaps a budgeting issue forced an early ending or something?

A lot of times animes don’t have much closure, because they need room for a sequel. However since second seasons of anime are decided on after DvD/Blu-Ray release typically a lot of times they never get that second season.

Edit: In this shows case, we would be talking about the same issue but with a third season. According to wikipidea the novel ran until 2011 and the last season was made in 09 so they may have been waiting on source material. You never know with anime, there still may be a 3rd season to come.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Good Anime
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Just watched Eden of the East and Maid Sama, both were really good. Trying out Devil May Cry now.

Edit: Finished Devil May Cry. It was pretty good for an action/fighting series, but then again I’ve never liked the genre. They always seem to be so lacking in terms of character development and character depth. More action than actual valuable storyline. That said, it was still definitely worth watching.

Read full topic
